details.desc: Rain, Lasswell, and Fina as they speed by on chocobos. A new journey dances in each of their hearts as they soar like the wind across the wide, open fields.
details.info: Rain, Lasswell, and Fina as they speed by on chocobos. A new journey dances in each of their hearts as they soar like the wind across the wide, open fields.

details.desc: Rain and Lasswell as they attack enemies aboard an airship. These knights were confused by the onslaught of small monsters who should fear airships, with no way to know that this was the mere beginning of a battle with the world's survival hanging in the balance.
details.info: Rain and Lasswell as they attack enemies aboard an airship. These knights were confused by the onslaught of small monsters who should fear airships, with no way to know that this was the mere beginning of a battle with the world's survival hanging in the balance.

details.desc: Water priestess, Luka, as she purifies the waters of Lake Dorr, and the water god Leviathan, who watches over her. The water god seems to be consoling Luka, who may require years upon years to fulfill her duty of purifying the lake alone.
details.info: Water priestess, Luka, as she purifies the waters of Lake Dorr, and the water god Leviathan, who watches over her. The water god seems to be consoling Luka, who may require years upon years to fulfill her duty of purifying the lake alone.

details.desc: Rain and Lasswell at the Earth Shrine as they confront a mysterious armor-clad intruder. The intruder unleashed a powerful attack at the duo, who warned him against coming near the Earth Crystal.
details.info: Rain and Lasswell at the Earth Shrine as they confront a mysterious armor-clad intruder. The intruder unleashed a powerful attack at the duo, who warned him against coming near the Earth Crystal.

100000501.name: In Order to Change the World

details.desc: Rain, overwhelmed with sadness in the ruined town of Sacher. Due to the royal blood within his veins, he lost the girl who saved his life, resolving himself to change the world. Wielding a cruel blade, he joins the Orders in hopes of becoming the next emperor.
details.info: Rain, overwhelmed with sadness in the ruined town of Sacher. Due to the royal blood within his veins, he lost the girl who saved his life, resolving himself to change the world. Wielding a cruel blade, he joins the Orders in hopes of becoming the next emperor.
details.shop: In Order to Change the World

details.desc: Realizing that Lasswell is struggling with his own feelings interfering with the fulfillment of his duties as king, Akstar challenges him to a sparring session. Determined to steer him in the right direction, Akstar bestows upon him a new skill of his own creation—the guiding mirror of equity.
details.info: Realizing that Lasswell is struggling with his own feelings interfering with the fulfillment of his duties as king, Akstar challenges him to a sparring session. Determined to steer him in the right direction, Akstar bestows upon him a new skill of his own creation—the guiding mirror of equity.

details.desc: Sol, in his attempt to destroy all of Lapis using the Chaotic Darkness. His name, which means sun, was given to him by a friend many long years ago.
details.info: Sol, in his attempt to destroy all of Lapis using the Chaotic Darkness. His name, which means sun, was given to him by a friend many long years ago.

details.desc: A scene depicting Shinju atop Est the coeurl as they carry out a surprise attack on an Aldore military base. They run circles around the soldiers guarding the area, toying with them like balls of yarn. Meow, meow!
details.info: A scene depicting Shinju atop Est the coeurl as they carry out a surprise attack on an Aldore military base. They run circles around the soldiers guarding the area, toying with them like balls of yarn. Meow, meow!

100000901.name: A Day in the Life of Physalis

details.desc: Physalis, living in Grandshelt with Fina. Each day is full of smiles and laughter for the boisterous bunch.
details.info: Physalis, living in Grandshelt with Fina. Each day is full of smiles and laughter for the boisterous bunch.
details.shop: A Day in the Life of Physalis

details.desc: A scene depicting Folka and Citra enjoying a luxurious vacation at the beach. Leaving their weapons aside, they are set on making the best out of their summer, even if this particular moment of peace and calm turns out to be brief.
details.info: A scene depicting Folka and Citra enjoying a luxurious vacation at the beach. Leaving their weapons aside, they are set on making the best out of their summer, even if this particular moment of peace and calm turns out to be brief.

100001101.name: Madam and the Giant Bird, Bennu

details.desc: Madam Edel, squaring off against the giant bird Bennu within some ancient ruins. The atmosphere is tense as treasure seeker and treasure protector face each other.
details.info: Madam Edel, squaring off against the giant bird Bennu within some ancient ruins. The atmosphere is tense as treasure seeker and treasure protector face each other.
details.shop: Madam and the Giant Bird, Bennu

100001301.name: アルティマニア1周年記念

details.desc: 魔道図書館で召喚を行うサクラと、それを見守るアヤカ。他に類を見ないサクラの魔法に、ミシディアの魔道士たちも大喜び。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！
details.shop: アルティマニア1周年記念

details.desc: The members of Morze's Soiree, all gathered together. Though they each spend their free time as they please, with but a single word from Madam, they transform into faithful subordinates ready to venture into the most treacherous of locales.
details.info: The members of Morze's Soiree, all gathered together. Though they each spend their free time as they please, with but a single word from Madam, they transform into faithful subordinates ready to venture into the most treacherous of locales.

details.desc: Fina and Daisy playing at the beach. Enjoying themselves amidst the sand and sea allows them to forget the hardship of battle. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace the two may someday find.
details.info: Fina and Daisy playing at the beach. Enjoying themselves amidst the sand and sea allows them to forget the hardship of battle. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace the two may someday find.

details.desc: With Aldore and Hess at war, Raegen and Rowen face each other on the battlefield. Raegen proposes to seal Rowen, as one of Hess's Eight Sages, within a crystal in order to bring an end to the conflict. Trusting his friend, Rowen places the future in Raegen's hands.
details.info: With Aldore and Hess at war, Raegen and Rowen face each other on the battlefield. Raegen proposes to seal Rowen, as one of Hess's Eight Sages, within a crystal in order to bring an end to the conflict. Trusting his friend, Rowen places the future in Raegen's hands.

details.desc: Rain and Fina have gathered to celebrate FFBE's 5th anniversary in Grandshelt! Together with their friends, they march in single file toward their destination, proudly holding a celebratory banner emblazoned with the number 5. They're almost at the venue!
details.info: Rain and Fina have gathered to celebrate FFBE's 5th anniversary in Grandshelt! Together with their friends, they march in single file toward their destination, proudly holding a celebratory banner emblazoned with the number 5. They're almost at the venue!

details.desc: Lasswell and Raegen have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. Father and son are hard at work making flags with Citra as fireworks light up the sky above. They're pouring their hearts into every single stitch.
details.info: Lasswell and Raegen have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. Father and son are hard at work making flags with Citra as fireworks light up the sky above. They're pouring their hearts into every single stitch.

details.desc: Charlotte and Physalis have gathered in Grandshelt's central plaza. At Charlotte's command, Physalis shoots the gift box the two brought with them, sending splendid decorations flying out. Thanks for everything!
details.info: Charlotte and Physalis have gathered in Grandshelt's central plaza. At Charlotte's command, Physalis shoots the gift box the two brought with them, sending splendid decorations flying out. Thanks for everything!

details.desc: Dark Fina and Sol have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. While Lid and Jake are busy decorating the roofs of the slums, Dark Fina and Sol blow up balloons below them with a young girl. These balloons are infused with a special magic, so they won't pop even after the festivities are over!
details.info: Dark Fina and Sol have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. While Lid and Jake are busy decorating the roofs of the slums, Dark Fina and Sol blow up balloons below them with a young girl. These balloons are infused with a special magic, so they won't pop even after the festivities are over!

details.desc: Akstar and Cleome have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. In front of the brilliantly decorated Colosseum, Cleome ties an adorable bow on a present with Rinora's help. The bow's every loop and knot is imbued with the special bond shared by teacher and student!
details.info: Akstar and Cleome have gathered in Grandshelt to ring in the New Year. In front of the brilliantly decorated Colosseum, Cleome ties an adorable bow on a present with Rinora's help. The bow's every loop and knot is imbued with the special bond shared by teacher and student!

details.desc: Lasswell, receiving Purple Lightning from Raegen in his youth. The blade was a perfect fit for a boy who refused to give up on his dream of growing stronger than anyone else, regardless of what natural talent might dictate. The young boy soon came to treasure it as a symbol of the bonds he shares with his father and his dear friend.
details.info: Lasswell, receiving Purple Lightning from Raegen in his youth. The blade was a perfect fit for a boy who refused to give up on his dream of growing stronger than anyone else, regardless of what natural talent might dictate. The young boy soon came to treasure it as a symbol of the bonds he shares with his father and his dear friend.

details.desc: Rain and the others have come leaping out of the crystals to ring in the New Year with everyone! Here's to another amazing year!
details.info: Rain and the others have come leaping out of the crystals to ring in the New Year with everyone! Here's to another amazing year!

details.desc: Rizer fights against enemy forces to defend his homeland. He bravely leads his army into the battle for control of the crystals and wields his blade to protect his beloved Grandshelt. It is this unwavering love for his country that serves as Rizer's true weapon.
details.info: Rizer fights against enemy forces to defend his homeland. He bravely leads his army into the battle for control of the crystals and wields his blade to protect his beloved Grandshelt. It is this unwavering love for his country that serves as Rizer's true weapon.

details.desc: Mazurka approaches Fina and Daisy, suggesting that they all get along. She hopes to someday get close enough that the three of them can even talk about their crushes together.
details.info: Mazurka approaches Fina and Daisy, suggesting that they all get along. She hopes to someday get close enough that the three of them can even talk about their crushes together.

details.desc: Melo faces enemies to protect his allies. Instead of calling it a pain and running away, he uses his full power to make a clean sweep of the monsters.
details.info: Melo faces enemies to protect his allies. Instead of calling it a pain and running away, he uses his full power to make a clean sweep of the monsters.

details.desc: Duke faces the dragon that was released from the seal. He joins forces with trustworthy friends from his home village, and they manage to safely reseal the dragon. In its place, they find the spear said to have been wielded by Ryunan, the first dragon sealer.
details.info: Duke faces the dragon that was released from the seal. He joins forces with trustworthy friends from his home village, and they manage to safely reseal the dragon. In its place, they find the spear said to have been wielded by Ryunan, the first dragon sealer.

details.desc: Ruggles carves a message to his friend on the stone monument in front of the tree of purification. Time passes, and the adventurer Helena and the mercenary Camille come to visit this same place.
details.info: Ruggles carves a message to his friend on the stone monument in front of the tree of purification. Time passes, and the adventurer Helena and the mercenary Camille come to visit this same place.

details.desc: The skilled gunsmith Macmedi and his grandchild, Lotti, who helps around the shop. Macmedi is an eccentric man of few words, but there's no doubt he cherishes his life with Lotti, his only surviving family.
details.info: The skilled gunsmith Macmedi and his grandchild, Lotti, who helps around the shop. Macmedi is an eccentric man of few words, but there's no doubt he cherishes his life with Lotti, his only surviving family.

details.desc: Chorale confesses his feelings to Nerine. As memories of their past together come flooding back, the ever-faithful steward reaffirms that the woman before him is the one he has always loved. Blessed by their two young onlookers, the two share a tender embrace.
details.info: Chorale confesses his feelings to Nerine. As memories of their past together come flooding back, the ever-faithful steward reaffirms that the woman before him is the one he has always loved. Blessed by their two young onlookers, the two share a tender embrace.

details.desc: Amid her pursuit to avenge her father's death at the hands of Majora, Tomoe faces Gravey, a member of her nemesis's inner circle. Having lost against Gravey once, Tomoe casts aside her doubts and defeats him as part of her mission to restore the Asura clan's honor as its next head.
details.info: Amid her pursuit to avenge her father's death at the hands of Majora, Tomoe faces Gravey, a member of her nemesis's inner circle. Having lost against Gravey once, Tomoe casts aside her doubts and defeats him as part of her mission to restore the Asura clan's honor as its next head.

details.desc: Being discovered as a spy, Domino makes her escape, accompanied by Shatal. As they mow down the approaching wolves, the two push ever further into the desert sands.
details.info: Being discovered as a spy, Domino makes her escape, accompanied by Shatal. As they mow down the approaching wolves, the two push ever further into the desert sands.

details.desc: Charlotte and the knights of Grandshelt head for a decisive battle against Lazarov, but they are not alone. By virtue of their fellowship with Rain and Lasswell, allies from all corners of the land have gathered in furtherance of Charlotte and the knights' endeavors, to fight together in their hour of need.
details.info: Charlotte and the knights of Grandshelt head for a decisive battle against Lazarov, but they are not alone. By virtue of their fellowship with Rain and Lasswell, allies from all corners of the land have gathered in furtherance of Charlotte and the knights' endeavors, to fight together in their hour of need.

details.desc: Nichol gazes out from inside a mysterious bubble together with Elle and Luka. Perhaps the three siblings saw a similar sight once upon a time.
details.info: Nichol gazes out from inside a mysterious bubble together with Elle and Luka. Perhaps the three siblings saw a similar sight once upon a time.

details.desc: Krowa mourns the suffering he caused during his time in the Orders. After he encounters the automaton Regina within ancient ruins, their journey together begins.
details.info: Krowa mourns the suffering he caused during his time in the Orders. After he encounters the automaton Regina within ancient ruins, their journey together begins.

details.desc: The mage apprentice Magna and his companion Leopold, who seeks a way to return to his original human form, dash through the forest to escape the elf Forelsket, a wandering chef searching for ingredients.
details.info: The mage apprentice Magna and his companion Leopold, who seeks a way to return to his original human form, dash through the forest to escape the elf Forelsket, a wandering chef searching for ingredients.

details.desc: Zeno of the Beta Star, who appeared before Rain after the crushing loss of his friends. Reaching across time itself, the two work towards their deepest wish, a goal they hold in common: to defeat Emperor Vlad.
details.info: Zeno of the Beta Star, who appeared before Rain after the crushing loss of his friends. Reaching across time itself, the two work towards their deepest wish, a goal they hold in common: to defeat Emperor Vlad.

details.desc: Humanoid robot Elnath joins Ein and Ein's daughter Alde as they play by the river, keeping watch over them. This brief moment of calm spent with his "family" remains with him as a truly fond memory.
details.info: Humanoid robot Elnath joins Ein and Ein's daughter Alde as they play by the river, keeping watch over them. This brief moment of calm spent with his "family" remains with him as a truly fond memory.

details.desc: Sakura and Nichol appear before a group of criminals. In preparation to make their capture, the duo make a splendid transformation into their Orders outfits.
details.info: Sakura and Nichol appear before a group of criminals. In preparation to make their capture, the duo make a splendid transformation into their Orders outfits.

details.desc: Roca was a baby that suddenly appeared in front of Fina. Her companions always watched over her as she matured at a remarkable speed during their journey throughout the Farplane.
details.info: Roca was a baby that suddenly appeared in front of Fina. Her companions always watched over her as she matured at a remarkable speed during their journey throughout the Farplane.

details.desc: Physalis enjoying her vacation with Moog. Swapping rifle for water gun, she fully intends to make the most of her summer. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace she may someday find.
details.info: Physalis enjoying her vacation with Moog. Swapping rifle for water gun, she fully intends to make the most of her summer. This vision is a glimpse into a moment of peace she may someday find.

details.desc: Taivas and his partner Runda proceed onward in the name of their mission, but not before annihilating the enemy soldiers they encounter en route with overwhelming force.
details.info: Taivas and his partner Runda proceed onward in the name of their mission, but not before annihilating the enemy soldiers they encounter en route with overwhelming force.

details.desc: Tulien gallantly rescues two youths from an Omega spawn, only to be narrowly bested by Taivas, who was in hot pursuit of the girl. Will the day of Tulien's ascension as a true hero ever come?
details.info: Tulien gallantly rescues two youths from an Omega spawn, only to be narrowly bested by Taivas, who was in hot pursuit of the girl. Will the day of Tulien's ascension as a true hero ever come?

details.desc: Taivas has succeeded in rescuing Lehftia, brandishing his blade like a demon to do so. During a moment of respite, he tells the grateful girl of the past which has long haunted him.
details.info: Taivas has succeeded in rescuing Lehftia, brandishing his blade like a demon to do so. During a moment of respite, he tells the grateful girl of the past which has long haunted him.

details.desc: Haveh and Lehftia share their first meeting in the forest, and Lehftia somberly buries a young chick. As the girl sheds tears for a short life now extinguished, Haveh finds himself captivated.
details.info: Haveh and Lehftia share their first meeting in the forest, and Lehftia somberly buries a young chick. As the girl sheds tears for a short life now extinguished, Haveh finds himself captivated.

details.desc: Bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's, the mysterious aggressor from the inauguration ceremony launches his attack against Visectrum.
details.info: Bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's, the mysterious aggressor from the inauguration ceremony launches his attack against Visectrum.

details.desc: Raegen awaits his inaugural speech together with the Sworn Six. His comrades offer him words of support as he takes his first steps as representative of a reborn Paladia.
details.info: Raegen awaits his inaugural speech together with the Sworn Six. His comrades offer him words of support as he takes his first steps as representative of a reborn Paladia.

details.desc: Naming himself Emperor, a man bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's arrives with a fury on Raegen's inauguration day. His intentions remain unclear as the battle for the fate of Paladia begins...
details.info: Naming himself Emperor, a man bearing a visage indistinguishable from Rain's arrives with a fury on Raegen's inauguration day. His intentions remain unclear as the battle for the fate of Paladia begins...

details.desc: Fina prays for a miracle to aid Rain and Lasswell as they endure a grueling battle. Her hopes resonate with the crystals of the earth, and a blinding light envelops the battlefield before taking on a familiar form...
details.info: Fina prays for a miracle to aid Rain and Lasswell as they endure a grueling battle. Her hopes resonate with the crystals of the earth, and a blinding light envelops the battlefield before taking on a familiar form...

details.desc: Presidential aides are responsible for all manner of tasks. While assignments such as regulating the political itinerary and gathering intel are vital services, image management is also of the utmost importance. In order for the new president to gain the people's trust and adoration, Nichol and Sakura take ample time to coordinate Raegen's attire.
details.info: Presidential aides are responsible for all manner of tasks. While assignments such as regulating the political itinerary and gathering intel are vital services, image management is also of the utmost importance. In order for the new president to gain the people's trust and adoration, Nichol and Sakura take ample time to coordinate Raegen's attire.

details.desc: Through Fina's prayers, countless hopes were called forth from Paladia itself, merging the souls of Rain and Lasswell and creating a warrior of unsurpassed might. The final clash with Dark Rain, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance, is about to begin!
details.info: Through Fina's prayers, countless hopes were called forth from Paladia itself, merging the souls of Rain and Lasswell and creating a warrior of unsurpassed might. The final clash with Dark Rain, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance, is about to begin!

details.desc: Yshe's would-be sparring partner, Taivas, is at the tavern once more, languishing neck-deep in a bottle. Even so, Yshe holds faith that the man she once knew will return, that the two might settle their score.
details.info: Yshe's would-be sparring partner, Taivas, is at the tavern once more, languishing neck-deep in a bottle. Even so, Yshe holds faith that the man she once knew will return, that the two might settle their score.

100005701.name: In the Name of Yshe's Elites

details.desc: Despite their clashing personalities and fundamentally different fighting styles, Kall and Ilmatalle share a deep respect for Commander Yshe and pride for the unit she leads. The two of them can always be counted on to execute their mission in the name of Yshe's Elites; indeed, they display exemplary cooperation in felling this particular foe.
details.info: Despite their clashing personalities and fundamentally different fighting styles, Kall and Ilmatalle share a deep respect for Commander Yshe and pride for the unit she leads. The two of them can always be counted on to execute their mission in the name of Yshe's Elites; indeed, they display exemplary cooperation in felling this particular foe.
details.shop: In the Name of Yshe's Elites

243476,243477: 発動条件：【魔防ユニット】

details.desc: 町の子供たちにプレゼントを配ることとなったシャルロットは、フリーゼ、シェパードとともに準備を進める。子供たちはどんな顔をするだろうか。想像を巡らす騎士たちの表情が、思わずほころぶ。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

details.desc: 一面の雪景色となった大地で戯れるドミノとシャタル。雪明りが照らす中、シャタルはドミノのために特大の雪だるまを作る。戦友のはしゃぐ姿を眺めながら、ドミノは特別な時間を心の底から楽しむのだった。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

details.desc: In one particular world, there exists a tradition wherein participants show off their talents at feasts for special occasions. To the delight of the guests, Rain's and Lasswell's visions decide to cross swords for their performance, putting on a bold show in the process.
details.info: In one particular world, there exists a tradition wherein participants show off their talents at feasts for special occasions. To the delight of the guests, Rain's and Lasswell's visions decide to cross swords for their performance, putting on a bold show in the process.

details.desc: A vision of Dark Fina dressed in a glamorous kimono and holding a snake. In some worlds, snakes are revered as messengers of divine beings. However, even this noble, holy serpent seems to open its heart to her.
details.info: A vision of Dark Fina dressed in a glamorous kimono and holding a snake. In some worlds, snakes are revered as messengers of divine beings. However, even this noble, holy serpent seems to open its heart to her.

details.desc: Upon their visit to the Six Realms, Dark Fina, King Mog, and their entourage are beset by a monster of massive might and measurements. Though the group is forced into an uphill battle, in response to the prayers of the rookie moogle, visions of Poppy and Lehftia appear to lend their aid!
details.info: Upon their visit to the Six Realms, Dark Fina, King Mog, and their entourage are beset by a monster of massive might and measurements. Though the group is forced into an uphill battle, in response to the prayers of the rookie moogle, visions of Poppy and Lehftia appear to lend their aid!

details.desc: The trump card of Caledfwlch's Unit 1, the Wygars—mechanical armor powered by the mark of transcendence. Their strength is immense and is said to easily crush destructive Omega spawn.
details.info: The trump card of Caledfwlch's Unit 1, the Wygars—mechanical armor powered by the mark of transcendence. Their strength is immense and is said to easily crush destructive Omega spawn.

details.desc: Having crossed the drawbridge, which was rebuilt on the king of Cornelia's orders, the Warriors of Light now venture to the northern continent. Crystals in hand, they set off on their quest to return light to the world.
details.info: Having crossed the drawbridge, which was rebuilt on the king of Cornelia's orders, the Warriors of Light now venture to the northern continent. Crystals in hand, they set off on their quest to return light to the world.

details.desc: Deep within Mount Gulg, the Warriors of Light battle Marilith, the Fiend of Fire. Though Marilith assails the party with unrelenting slashes and all-consuming flames, the Warriors of Light shall fight ever onward to victory!
details.info: Deep within Mount Gulg, the Warriors of Light battle Marilith, the Fiend of Fire. Though Marilith assails the party with unrelenting slashes and all-consuming flames, the Warriors of Light shall fight ever onward to victory!

details.desc: Firion and company as they are set upon by the Palamecian Empire's black knights. This tenacious pursuit leaves them little time to catch their breath as they flee the empire's all-out assault.
details.info: Firion and company as they are set upon by the Palamecian Empire's black knights. This tenacious pursuit leaves them little time to catch their breath as they flee the empire's all-out assault.

details.desc: Newly risen from the bowels of Hell, the emperor appears before Firion and his companions, announcing his plan to destroy the world. Ricard allows the others to flee while he faces the emperor alone.
details.info: Newly risen from the bowels of Hell, the emperor appears before Firion and his companions, announcing his plan to destroy the world. Ricard allows the others to flee while he faces the emperor alone.

details.desc: In a bid to escape Leviathan, Firion and his allies stand alongside their new companion, Ricard, and challenge the Roundworm that blocks their path.
details.info: In a bid to escape Leviathan, Firion and his allies stand alongside their new companion, Ricard, and challenge the Roundworm that blocks their path.

details.desc: Luneth, Arc, Refia, and Ingus being chosen by the Wind Crystal to become Warriors of Light. Blessed with the Crystal's power, the four embark on a journey to save the world.
details.info: Luneth, Arc, Refia, and Ingus being chosen by the Wind Crystal to become Warriors of Light. Blessed with the Crystal's power, the four embark on a journey to save the world.

details.desc: Cecil and his party come face-to-face with Barbariccia, one of Golbez's four Archfiends, in the Tower of Zot. Kain, sanity reclaimed, executes a jumping attack on the cyclone-like Empress of the Winds.
details.info: Cecil and his party come face-to-face with Barbariccia, one of Golbez's four Archfiends, in the Tower of Zot. Kain, sanity reclaimed, executes a jumping attack on the cyclone-like Empress of the Winds.

details.desc: In front of Edge, who despairs at having lost his parents, appears Rubicante, the last of Golbez's four Archfiends. Edge, having awoken to the rage-fueled power which slumbered within him, now stands ready to face his foe.
details.info: In front of Edge, who despairs at having lost his parents, appears Rubicante, the last of Golbez's four Archfiends. Edge, having awoken to the rage-fueled power which slumbered within him, now stands ready to face his foe.

details.desc: Cecil and his allies battle with Golbez in a bid to defend the Dark Crystal in the Dwarven Castle. Just as the party is backed into a corner with no way out, Rydia appears before them, now grown from her time in the Feymarch.
details.info: Cecil and his allies battle with Golbez in a bid to defend the Dark Crystal in the Dwarven Castle. Just as the party is backed into a corner with no way out, Rydia appears before them, now grown from her time in the Feymarch.

205000101.name: Syldra! Come Up and Say Hello!

details.desc: Faris introduces her best friend Syldra to Lenna, who is trying to figure out how to get their ship moving with the wind having stopped. With Syldra's help, they manage to sail across the windless sea.
details.info: Faris introduces her best friend Syldra to Lenna, who is trying to figure out how to get their ship moving with the wind having stopped. With Syldra's help, they manage to sail across the windless sea.
details.shop: Syldra! Come Up and Say Hello!

details.desc: The party discovers a wounded wind drake at the summit of North Mountain. In order to salve its wounds, Lenna marches through a field of poison grass, picking the dragon grass which grows at the far edge. Lenna's boldness in the face of such danger no doubt springs from her powerful bond with the wind drake.
details.info: The party discovers a wounded wind drake at the summit of North Mountain. In order to salve its wounds, Lenna marches through a field of poison grass, picking the dragon grass which grows at the far edge. Lenna's boldness in the face of such danger no doubt springs from her powerful bond with the wind drake.

details.desc: Magitek armors heading towards Narshe to obtain an esper encased in ice. One of the three is piloted by Terra, a girl being controlled by the Empire due to her ability to use magic.
details.info: Magitek armors heading towards Narshe to obtain an esper encased in ice. One of the three is piloted by Terra, a girl being controlled by the Empire due to her ability to use magic.

details.desc: Locke, after temporarily reviving his former lover Rachel using Phoenix's magicite. Although their reunion was brief, her final words allowed Locke to let go of the regrets from his past.
details.info: Locke, after temporarily reviving his former lover Rachel using Phoenix's magicite. Although their reunion was brief, her final words allowed Locke to let go of the regrets from his past.

details.desc: At the Opera House, Celes steps onto the stage in place of the actress, Maria, and sings of her lover, Draco. In response to the affection shown to her by the ephemeral Draco, Maria swears her eternal love to him.
details.info: At the Opera House, Celes steps onto the stage in place of the actress, Maria, and sings of her lover, Draco. In response to the affection shown to her by the ephemeral Draco, Maria swears her eternal love to him.

details.desc: A scene depicting Cloud with Jessie, an Avalanche member, riding through the night on a motorcycle. He shows off his impressive driving skills all the while fending off the Shinra security officers on their tail.
details.info: A scene depicting Cloud with Jessie, an Avalanche member, riding through the night on a motorcycle. He shows off his impressive driving skills all the while fending off the Shinra security officers on their tail.

details.desc: When Cloud and Barret infiltrate Mako Reactor 1 in order to destroy it, Shinra sends the Scorpion Sentinel to put a stop to their plans.
details.info: When Cloud and Barret infiltrate Mako Reactor 1 in order to destroy it, Shinra sends the Scorpion Sentinel to put a stop to their plans.

details.desc: In a corner of Midgar's upper Sector 8, Aerith, the flower peddler, kneels down before a set of glowing pipes overflowing with mako energy—the lifeblood of the planet.
details.info: In a corner of Midgar's upper Sector 8, Aerith, the flower peddler, kneels down before a set of glowing pipes overflowing with mako energy—the lifeblood of the planet.

details.desc: A scene depicting Tifa and Cloud returning from a long day of performing odd jobs in the Sector 7 slums. Tifa puts on an impressive show, expertly serving up a cocktail to soothe a weary soul.
details.info: A scene depicting Tifa and Cloud returning from a long day of performing odd jobs in the Sector 7 slums. Tifa puts on an impressive show, expertly serving up a cocktail to soothe a weary soul.

details.desc: A scene depicting Aerith, Barret, and Red XIII attempting to make their escape from the Shinra Building. However, barring their path is the Arsenal, a powerful autonomous weapons platform.
details.info: A scene depicting Aerith, Barret, and Red XIII attempting to make their escape from the Shinra Building. However, barring their path is the Arsenal, a powerful autonomous weapons platform.

details.desc: A scene depicting Sephiroth suddenly appearing before Cloud and his party as they plot their escape from the Shinra Building. Cloud attempts a mighty slash attack, but Sephiroth effortlessly deflects the blow, causing Cloud to fall to the floor below.
details.info: A scene depicting Sephiroth suddenly appearing before Cloud and his party as they plot their escape from the Shinra Building. Cloud attempts a mighty slash attack, but Sephiroth effortlessly deflects the blow, causing Cloud to fall to the floor below.

details.desc: In order to save Rinoa, who's fallen into a coma, Squall sets out for Esthar, where Ellone is said to be. Along the way, he reveals to Rinoa the true feelings he had kept hidden.
details.info: In order to save Rinoa, who's fallen into a coma, Squall sets out for Esthar, where Ellone is said to be. Along the way, he reveals to Rinoa the true feelings he had kept hidden.

details.desc: Laguna and the others joined a movie as actors in order to earn money for travel expenses, only to be attacked by a real dragon instead of the fake meant for the scene. The director and actress having fled, Laguna is left to fight one-on-one using his gunblade.
details.info: Laguna and the others joined a movie as actors in order to earn money for travel expenses, only to be attacked by a real dragon instead of the fake meant for the scene. The director and actress having fled, Laguna is left to fight one-on-one using his gunblade.

details.desc: Zidane and Blank performing a fight scene from "I Want to Be Your Canary," a play that is wildly popular in the kingdom of Alexandria. Sitting on the royal throne is Queen Brahne, intently gazing at their breathtaking swordplay.
details.info: Zidane and Blank performing a fight scene from "I Want to Be Your Canary," a play that is wildly popular in the kingdom of Alexandria. Sitting on the royal throne is Queen Brahne, intently gazing at their breathtaking swordplay.

details.desc: In the half-destroyed ruins of Kilika Port, decimated by Sin's recent assault, Yuna performs a sending. Summoners enact this ritual dance in order to guide lost spirits unto the realm of the dead, lest they become fiends.
details.info: In the half-destroyed ruins of Kilika Port, decimated by Sin's recent assault, Yuna performs a sending. Summoners enact this ritual dance in order to guide lost spirits unto the realm of the dead, lest they become fiends.

details.desc: Following Sin's sudden onslaught of Zanarkand, a gaping maw eclipses the sky over the city. As they are about to be drawn in, Auron declares to Tidus, "This is your story."
details.info: Following Sin's sudden onslaught of Zanarkand, a gaping maw eclipses the sky over the city. As they are about to be drawn in, Auron declares to Tidus, "This is your story."

details.desc: Incessant crashes of lightning welcome the summoner Yuna's party to the unremitting gloom of the Thunder Plains. Clinging to Tidus and on the verge of panic due to her fear of lightning, Rikku begs everyone to stop for a rest.
details.info: Incessant crashes of lightning welcome the summoner Yuna's party to the unremitting gloom of the Thunder Plains. Clinging to Tidus and on the verge of panic due to her fear of lightning, Rikku begs everyone to stop for a rest.

210000401.name: 最後じゃなくて……ずっと

details.desc: マカラーニャの森にある泉で抱きしめ合うティーダとユウナ。美しくも幻想的な場所で、二人は互いの気持ちを確かめるように口づけを交わす。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！
details.shop: 最後じゃなくて……ずっと

details.desc: 聖ベベル宮で行われるシーモアとユウナの結婚式場に向かうティーダたち。飛空艇から射出されたアンカーつきワイヤーの上を、華麗に滑り降りていく。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

details.desc: まだ小さかった頃のティーダと、父親のジェクト。ジェクトシュートを失敗するティーダの前で、ジェクトが成功例を披露する。ティーダにとって、忘れられない『あの日の思い出』だ。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

details.desc: Aphmau tries to prevent a second Ragnarok, but falls from Alexander's attack. Then, the Empire's Avatar and the Dark Rider face off in an attempt to destroy each other once more.
details.info: Aphmau tries to prevent a second Ragnarok, but falls from Alexander's attack. Then, the Empire's Avatar and the Dark Rider face off in an attempt to destroy each other once more.

details.desc: The Judge Magisters, assembled in front of the throne of the Archadian Empire. Between them, they lead the Judges in filling a number of roles including Inspector, Judge, and Executioner.
details.info: The Judge Magisters, assembled in front of the throne of the Archadian Empire. Between them, they lead the Judges in filling a number of roles including Inspector, Judge, and Executioner.

212000301.name: I Play the Leading Man, Who Else?

details.desc: Vaan sneaks into the treasure room of the royal palace and takes the magicite hidden within the statue of the goddess. Yet who should appear but sky pirate Balthier and his companion, Fran, who also seek the stone!
details.info: Vaan sneaks into the treasure room of the royal palace and takes the magicite hidden within the statue of the goddess. Yet who should appear but sky pirate Balthier and his companion, Fran, who also seek the stone!
details.shop: I Play the Leading Man, Who Else?

details.desc: In the ancient city of Giruvegan, Ashe comes face-to-face with the Occuria, beings which have long controlled Ivalice's history from the shadows. Guided by illusions of Rasler, she takes the Treaty-Blade in hand that revenge might be hers.
details.info: In the ancient city of Giruvegan, Ashe comes face-to-face with the Occuria, beings which have long controlled Ivalice's history from the shadows. Guided by illusions of Rasler, she takes the Treaty-Blade in hand that revenge might be hers.

details.desc: Aboard Balthier's airship, the Strahl, this merry band departs for the Skycity of Bhujerba. Thrilled to be riding his first airship, Vaan vows to rescue the kidnapped Penelo.
details.info: Aboard Balthier's airship, the Strahl, this merry band departs for the Skycity of Bhujerba. Thrilled to be riding his first airship, Vaan vows to rescue the kidnapped Penelo.

details.desc: A scene depicting the savior, Lightning, as she descends to Yusnaan Palace on a mission to save human souls. As monsters born of the Chaos begin materializing, she finds herself in a heated battle against an old friend—Snow.
details.info: A scene depicting the savior, Lightning, as she descends to Yusnaan Palace on a mission to save human souls. As monsters born of the Chaos begin materializing, she finds herself in a heated battle against an old friend—Snow.

details.desc: A scene depicting Snow absorbing Chaos. Partially transforming into a Cie'th, Snow intends to prevent the spread of a Chaos infusion. Burdened by the great regret of failing to protect his lover, he asks the savior to end his suffering as he becomes more monster than man.
details.info: A scene depicting Snow absorbing Chaos. Partially transforming into a Cie'th, Snow intends to prevent the spread of a Chaos infusion. Burdened by the great regret of failing to protect his lover, he asks the savior to end his suffering as he becomes more monster than man.

details.desc: Noctis, after his long-awaited return to his home kingdom's capital, Insomnia. Taking his place as the True King, he engages in a vicious battle with Ardyn in order to return light back to the ruined world.
details.info: Noctis, after his long-awaited return to his home kingdom's capital, Insomnia. Taking his place as the True King, he engages in a vicious battle with Ardyn in order to return light back to the ruined world.

details.desc: Ardyn and Noctis driving to the colossal crater known as the "Disc of Cauthess." According to Ardyn, the Archaean supporting the meteorite resting in the crater is supposedly calling for Noctis.
details.info: Ardyn and Noctis driving to the colossal crater known as the "Disc of Cauthess." According to Ardyn, the Archaean supporting the meteorite resting in the crater is supposedly calling for Noctis.

details.desc: Lunafreya comes to the unconscious Noctis's aid after awakening Leviathan, the Goddess of the Seas. Even while suffering a grave injury, she must fulfill her duty as the Oracle.
details.info: Lunafreya comes to the unconscious Noctis's aid after awakening Leviathan, the Goddess of the Seas. Even while suffering a grave injury, she must fulfill her duty as the Oracle.

details.desc: The invasion by the Militesi Empire left Akademeia, the backbone of the Dominion of Rubrum, at the brink of destruction. It was then that the mysterious class of Agito Cadets, Class Zero, appeared, draped in crimson capes.
details.info: The invasion by the Militesi Empire left Akademeia, the backbone of the Dominion of Rubrum, at the brink of destruction. It was then that the mysterious class of Agito Cadets, Class Zero, appeared, draped in crimson capes.

details.desc: Tsarevna Alena faces off against a gang of abominable showmen in the Endor Colosseum. Alena never backs down from a fight, even when facing a crew of dastardly doppelgangers. Loyal retainers Kiryl and Borya cross their fingers for luck as they watch the proceedings.
details.info: Tsarevna Alena faces off against a gang of abominable showmen in the Endor Colosseum. Alena never backs down from a fight, even when facing a crew of dastardly doppelgangers. Loyal retainers Kiryl and Borya cross their fingers for luck as they watch the proceedings.

details.desc: Hawkeye runs into Riesz and the others when they return to take back Laurent Castle. Riesz accepts his plea for them to capture Belladonna without killing her, and Hawkeye kisses her in joy.
details.info: Hawkeye runs into Riesz and the others when they return to take back Laurent Castle. Riesz accepts his plea for them to capture Belladonna without killing her, and Hawkeye kisses her in joy.

331000101.name: A Part Is Better than Zero

details.desc: Following the fall of the Goliath, Fei and Elly are separated from their comrades and find themselves adrift at sea. In order to raise the spirits of her despondent raftmate, Elly confesses that it was thanks to Fei that she was able to change.
details.info: Following the fall of the Goliath, Fei and Elly are separated from their comrades and find themselves adrift at sea. In order to raise the spirits of her despondent raftmate, Elly confesses that it was thanks to Fei that she was able to change.
details.shop: A Part Is Better than Zero

details.desc: A scene depicting an unfaltering Sora riding atop a myriad of keyblades as he faces off against a gigantic tide of Heartless.
details.info: A scene depicting an unfaltering Sora riding atop a myriad of keyblades as he faces off against a gigantic tide of Heartless.

details.desc: A scene depicting Riku as he searches for the missing keyblade wielder "Aqua" in the Realm of Darkness. There, he faces off against a tower made of innumerable Heartless.
details.info: A scene depicting Riku as he searches for the missing keyblade wielder "Aqua" in the Realm of Darkness. There, he faces off against a tower made of innumerable Heartless.

details.desc: A scene depicting Sora and Kairi sitting on the trunk of a paopu tree. Rumor has it that when two people share the fruit of this tree, they will always be reunited regardless of whatever hardships may try to keep them apart.
details.info: A scene depicting Sora and Kairi sitting on the trunk of a paopu tree. Rumor has it that when two people share the fruit of this tree, they will always be reunited regardless of whatever hardships may try to keep them apart.

details.desc: 無数の物語が浮かぶ不思議な空間“ライブラリ”でのひとときを過ごすキャラクターズ。彼女たちは作者復活という目的のため、時に共闘することもあるが、最終的には殺し合う運命を辿る。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

details.desc: A scene depicting Edward awakening in a blank space following his attempt at a human transmutation. Truth awaits beyond the great gate, revealing that those who break the taboo will gain infinite knowledge, but only at a very high price.
details.info: A scene depicting Edward awakening in a blank space following his attempt at a human transmutation. Truth awaits beyond the great gate, revealing that those who break the taboo will gain infinite knowledge, but only at a very high price.

details.desc: A gigantic crystal which suddenly emerged from beneath the kingdom of Leonis. According to Sadali, founder of the Crystal Sanctum, it is said to appear "when the holy ground is soaked with blood shed in sorrow and hatred."
details.info: A gigantic crystal which suddenly emerged from beneath the kingdom of Leonis. According to Sadali, founder of the Crystal Sanctum, it is said to appear "when the holy ground is soaked with blood shed in sorrow and hatred."

242122: 発動条件：【聖剣伝説ユニット】

details.desc: 瑠璃や真珠姫とともに珠魅の核を狙う宝石泥棒の事件を解決し、マイホームに帰ってきた青年。彼は、家で待っていたバドとコロナに「ただいま」を告げる。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

243413: 発動条件：【アクトレイザー・ルネサンスユニット】

details.desc: かつての人間たちが神の姿を想像し、彫刻した古い石像。今再び目覚めた神様は、この石像に宿ることで地上に降り立ち、地上に蔓延る魔物たちを一掃すべく動き出す。
details.info: ビジョンカードが経験値を獲得！

344000101.name: Father and Son Dragons Set Out

details.desc: Before the showdown with Dark King Vearn, despite their past differences, Dai and Baran stand back to back. Dai asks Baran about his mother, and Baran tells Dai of Soala.
details.info: Before the showdown with Dark King Vearn, despite their past differences, Dai and Baran stand back to back. Dai asks Baran about his mother, and Baran tells Dai of Soala.
details.shop: Father and Son Dragons Set Out

details.desc: Five Disciples of Avan face off against the mighty Dark Army. No matter how dire it may be, these warriors never despair, for the strength of their hearts is their greatest weapon!
details.info: Five Disciples of Avan face off against the mighty Dark Army. No matter how dire it may be, these warriors never despair, for the strength of their hearts is their greatest weapon!

details.desc: Dai stops the Sovereign Rock Castle's attack on Papnica Grand Chapel. The sword of Dai, which can unleash all of the wielder's energy in a single blow, was powerful enough to cleave the Sovereign Rock Castle in two.
details.info: Dai stops the Sovereign Rock Castle's attack on Papnica Grand Chapel. The sword of Dai, which can unleash all of the wielder's energy in a single blow, was powerful enough to cleave the Sovereign Rock Castle in two.

details.desc: The Legion Commanders of the Dark Army: with Mystvearn, the Shadow Vizier; Dragon Master General Baran; Hyunckel, the Dark Swordsman; the Beast King Crocodine; the Mystic Bishop Zaboera; and Blizzblaze General Flazzard all under the command of Dark Commander Hadlar, this is the very best the Army has to offer!
details.info: The Legion Commanders of the Dark Army: with Mystvearn, the Shadow Vizier; Dragon Master General Baran; Hyunckel, the Dark Swordsman; the Beast King Crocodine; the Mystic Bishop Zaboera; and Blizzblaze General Flazzard all under the command of Dark Commander Hadlar, this is the very best the Army has to offer!

details.desc: Not one to spend much of his time physically exerting himself, Yoshikiri prefers to do most of his training virtually⁠—through games. This modern type of training may do little for his melee skills, but it does serve as good reflex practice for his ranged attacks.
details.info: Not one to spend much of his time physically exerting himself, Yoshikiri prefers to do most of his training virtually⁠—through games. This modern type of training may do little for his melee skills, but it does serve as good reflex practice for his ranged attacks.

details.desc: Dwelling within a sacred tree, Ibara has received many visitors over the centuries. This has made her more and more curious about humans, sparking within her a desire to understand them. How will she feel, and what will she do, when someone in true need of her power finally appears?
details.info: Dwelling within a sacred tree, Ibara has received many visitors over the centuries. This has made her more and more curious about humans, sparking within her a desire to understand them. How will she feel, and what will she do, when someone in true need of her power finally appears?

details.desc: A cake made to celebrate the 4th Anniversary of FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS. The story's main protagonists and other beloved heroes adorn it as they partake in the joyous festivities. Thank you all for four wonderful years!
details.info: A cake made to celebrate the 4th Anniversary of FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS. The story's main protagonists and other beloved heroes adorn it as they partake in the joyous festivities. Thank you all for four wonderful years!

details.desc: A moment in time depicting Elena touching the Crystal that grants her the power of all the warriors who have wielded it before her. She is determined to fight alongside her partner, the Azure Crystal, to bring back light to the world.
details.info: A moment in time depicting Elena touching the Crystal that grants her the power of all the warriors who have wielded it before her. She is determined to fight alongside her partner, the Azure Crystal, to bring back light to the world.

details.desc: A scene depicting Eldryn teaching his young daughter the basics of fencing. Although he was unable to continue teaching her after his disappearance, she never forgot these lessons, even under the tutelage of her new swordmaster.
details.info: A scene depicting Eldryn teaching his young daughter the basics of fencing. Although he was unable to continue teaching her after his disappearance, she never forgot these lessons, even under the tutelage of her new swordmaster.

details.desc: Shui Yu, grandmaster of the School of Lian Hua, displaying her mastery of the Lian Hua arts. With a swing of her rod, elegant lotuses bloom from even the most polluted waters. Few are granted the chance to witness this miraculous art, cultivating the myth that long life and prosperity are bestowed upon those who are lucky enough to see it performed firsthand.
details.info: Shui Yu, grandmaster of the School of Lian Hua, displaying her mastery of the Lian Hua arts. With a swing of her rod, elegant lotuses bloom from even the most polluted waters. Few are granted the chance to witness this miraculous art, cultivating the myth that long life and prosperity are bestowed upon those who are lucky enough to see it performed firsthand.

details.desc: After a long trip of monster-slaying and people-saving, Noppy returns to the Farplane. While it might seem like Noppy is merely taking a break, this couldn't be further than the truth. It's the perfect time to polish up Noppy's equipment before setting off on another grand adventure!
details.info: After a long trip of monster-slaying and people-saving, Noppy returns to the Farplane. While it might seem like Noppy is merely taking a break, this couldn't be further than the truth. It's the perfect time to polish up Noppy's equipment before setting off on another grand adventure!

details.desc: Ygni studies the intricacies of black magic in a dark and enchanted chamber. Accompanied by Necrosia, a terrifying monster under the moogle's control, they toil away hoping to reap the fruits of their seemingly never-ending research.
details.info: Ygni studies the intricacies of black magic in a dark and enchanted chamber. Accompanied by Necrosia, a terrifying monster under the moogle's control, they toil away hoping to reap the fruits of their seemingly never-ending research.

details.desc: After prolonged exposure to various banes and ills, Cressnik has mastered the unique skill of converting even the most vile of energies into healing magic. Despite the detrimental effects miasma has on his own body, he has sworn to use his power to help as many patients as he can.
details.info: After prolonged exposure to various banes and ills, Cressnik has mastered the unique skill of converting even the most vile of energies into healing magic. Despite the detrimental effects miasma has on his own body, he has sworn to use his power to help as many patients as he can.

details.desc: Everywhere they go, Bulwark & the Melodic Mascots are well received by the local population. The merry band of friends never fail to lift the spirits of the townspeople with their jubilant tunes, as they perform their musical parade to the roaring crowds.
details.info: Everywhere they go, Bulwark & the Melodic Mascots are well received by the local population. The merry band of friends never fail to lift the spirits of the townspeople with their jubilant tunes, as they perform their musical parade to the roaring crowds.

details.desc: After spending her life training in order to get revenge on the monster that killed her family, Kaktiria is finally reunited with them. She passed away with a smile on her face, as now they are free to frolic among the desert dunes as they did long ago, without a care in the world.
details.info: After spending her life training in order to get revenge on the monster that killed her family, Kaktiria is finally reunited with them. She passed away with a smile on her face, as now they are free to frolic among the desert dunes as they did long ago, without a care in the world.

details.desc: In his former kingdom, King Behemy ruled with awesome might. His fearsome roars served as a display of his strength, assuring his loyal subjects that he alone was enough to keep their territory safe. After all, one cannot be called a king without a kingdom to rule.
details.info: In his former kingdom, King Behemy ruled with awesome might. His fearsome roars served as a display of his strength, assuring his loyal subjects that he alone was enough to keep their territory safe. After all, one cannot be called a king without a kingdom to rule.

details.desc: Melia meticulously paints vibrant colors onto each and every egg with help from her bunny friends before hiding them throughout the forest. The eggs decorated by Melia are so beautiful that they bring a smile to the face of anyone who manages to find one.
details.info: Melia meticulously paints vibrant colors onto each and every egg with help from her bunny friends before hiding them throughout the forest. The eggs decorated by Melia are so beautiful that they bring a smile to the face of anyone who manages to find one.

details.desc: Vinera, true to her heart, stepped forward to protect Dario after the truth about their marriage was revealed by Doluza. She refused to follow Doluza's instructions to kill Dario, not after the kindness and love he had showered upon her.
details.info: Vinera, true to her heart, stepped forward to protect Dario after the truth about their marriage was revealed by Doluza. She refused to follow Doluza's instructions to kill Dario, not after the kindness and love he had showered upon her.

details.desc: Two young men who met in the distant Farplane.Mont—the prince of the war-torn realm of Leonis, who wishes for peace to return to Ardra; and Rain—the knight from the kingdom of Grandshelt who has saved Lapis and Paladia from numerous calamities.Summoned from different worlds as visions by the Will of Light, they were tasked with defeating an evil which threated the Farplane.Sensing their own purity of heart in one another, they formed a bond of trust and drew their swords together to protect not only their own worlds, but the peace of every world that intersects with the Farplane.
details.info: Two young men who met in the distant Farplane.Mont—the prince of the war-torn realm of Leonis, who wishes for peace to return to Ardra; and Rain—the knight from the kingdom of Grandshelt who has saved Lapis and Paladia from numerous calamities.Summoned from different worlds as visions by the Will of Light, they were tasked with defeating an evil which threated the Farplane.Sensing their own purity of heart in one another, they formed a bond of trust and drew their swords together to protect not only their own worlds, but the peace of every world that intersects with the Farplane.

details.desc: Skye enjoying a fleeting moment of joy with a few fellow high-flying friends. It's moments like this that make her realize the trials she faces are worth it to protect the peace.
details.info: Skye enjoying a fleeting moment of joy with a few fellow high-flying friends. It's moments like this that make her realize the trials she faces are worth it to protect the peace.

details.desc: A scene depicting Lara fighting against a fearsome creature from the past—the legendary T-Rex. She will have to use her famous wits and agility, as well as her surroundings, to defeat this prehistoric foe.
details.info: A scene depicting Lara fighting against a fearsome creature from the past—the legendary T-Rex. She will have to use her famous wits and agility, as well as her surroundings, to defeat this prehistoric foe.

details.desc: Olivera and his twin sister, Rivera, practice hard at home in order to deliver a perfect performance every time. They rely on each other to bring out each other's best, which really allows their music to shine.
details.info: Olivera and his twin sister, Rivera, practice hard at home in order to deliver a perfect performance every time. They rely on each other to bring out each other's best, which really allows their music to shine.

details.desc: A scene depicting Karten visiting the ruins of what was once his home. Whilst enveloped in a deep melancholy, the light of the full moon shines through and causes him to turn. His emotional state seems to amplify the effects of the curse, despite his improved control over the years.
details.info: A scene depicting Karten visiting the ruins of what was once his home. Whilst enveloped in a deep melancholy, the light of the full moon shines through and causes him to turn. His emotional state seems to amplify the effects of the curse, despite his improved control over the years.

details.desc: The thrill of the chase!! Maeve uses her personalized Boar Hammer to finish a foe, then drags the game back home to prepare a lovely dinner for her mother and siblings. She is careful to always show respect to the animals she serves, as she understands how hard it is to survive.
details.info: The thrill of the chase!! Maeve uses her personalized Boar Hammer to finish a foe, then drags the game back home to prepare a lovely dinner for her mother and siblings. She is careful to always show respect to the animals she serves, as she understands how hard it is to survive.

details.desc: Attacked by a mechanical weapon, Louise and Collin find themselves in a pinch. Louise refuses to give up, remembering her hopes of becoming a hero that can protect everyone, and it's then that her moogle Harold grants her the power of the Crimson Crystal. She dons the suit she developed, awakening as the Warrior of the Crimson Crystal...!
details.info: Attacked by a mechanical weapon, Louise and Collin find themselves in a pinch. Louise refuses to give up, remembering her hopes of becoming a hero that can protect everyone, and it's then that her moogle Harold grants her the power of the Crimson Crystal. She dons the suit she developed, awakening as the Warrior of the Crimson Crystal...!

details.desc: After a day of hard work performing as a dancer, she makes preparations for her encore performance as the vigilante, the White Dragon. Despite the arduous double life she leads, deep in her heart, Ling is content with the knowledge that she is using her talent to make a difference in the lives of those who are unable to fend for themselves.
details.info: After a day of hard work performing as a dancer, she makes preparations for her encore performance as the vigilante, the White Dragon. Despite the arduous double life she leads, deep in her heart, Ling is content with the knowledge that she is using her talent to make a difference in the lives of those who are unable to fend for themselves.

details.desc: It sometimes takes several attempts before Tiana can come up with a successful salve, but if she fails, she just dusts herself off and tries again. Nothing beats the sense of accomplishment she feels when she creates a new concoction!
details.info: It sometimes takes several attempts before Tiana can come up with a successful salve, but if she fails, she just dusts herself off and tries again. Nothing beats the sense of accomplishment she feels when she creates a new concoction!

details.desc: He may be a divine guardian, but Chow is still as playful, if not more, than the average dog. When the people around him are safe, he likes going on walks and frolicking outside. Both the friendliest and furriest of guardians, he always brings a smile to people's faces.
details.info: He may be a divine guardian, but Chow is still as playful, if not more, than the average dog. When the people around him are safe, he likes going on walks and frolicking outside. Both the friendliest and furriest of guardians, he always brings a smile to people's faces.

details.desc: When the dazzling colors that light up the sky begin to fade, it signals the start of a brand new year. Although an uncertain future filled with anticipation and anxiety may lie ahead, a certain hero embraces them both with the words, "Leave things to me!"
details.info: When the dazzling colors that light up the sky begin to fade, it signals the start of a brand new year. Although an uncertain future filled with anticipation and anxiety may lie ahead, a certain hero embraces them both with the words, "Leave things to me!"

details.desc: Elena became the Warrior of the Azure Crystal in order to foil the evil schemes of the Dark Crystal. Her heart filled with an unwavering sense of justice, she continues to walk the path of a hero.
details.info: Elena became the Warrior of the Azure Crystal in order to foil the evil schemes of the Dark Crystal. Her heart filled with an unwavering sense of justice, she continues to walk the path of a hero.

details.desc: In order to get stronger, Esther faces her most fearsome foe yet in battle–herself. In a show of both skill and lighting-fast speed, she bests her look-alike and is rewarded with a well-earned victory, leaving no egg on her face.
details.info: In order to get stronger, Esther faces her most fearsome foe yet in battle–herself. In a show of both skill and lighting-fast speed, she bests her look-alike and is rewarded with a well-earned victory, leaving no egg on her face.

details.desc: Reberta and her dragon, Ignitos, spend nearly all of their time together, both on and off the battlefield. The love and trust they share for each other is so strong that it is as if they are two halves of one whole, like a spearhead and its shaft.
details.info: Reberta and her dragon, Ignitos, spend nearly all of their time together, both on and off the battlefield. The love and trust they share for each other is so strong that it is as if they are two halves of one whole, like a spearhead and its shaft.

details.desc: Even after earning the title of swordmaster, Fryevia has never forgotten her mentors' teachings. She continues partaking in duels and tournaments around the world to keep her skills razor sharp. Seeking neither fame nor glory she always fights anonymously, leaving behind an air of mystery.
details.info: Even after earning the title of swordmaster, Fryevia has never forgotten her mentors' teachings. She continues partaking in duels and tournaments around the world to keep her skills razor sharp. Seeking neither fame nor glory she always fights anonymously, leaving behind an air of mystery.

details.desc: The dragoon known as the "Crimson Death" soars through the skies with the wings of her beloved dragon partner. There exists no enemy that can stand up to the combination of her masterful skill with a lance and the tenacious wings of a dragon.
details.info: The dragoon known as the "Crimson Death" soars through the skies with the wings of her beloved dragon partner. There exists no enemy that can stand up to the combination of her masterful skill with a lance and the tenacious wings of a dragon.

details.desc: Her heart and will have grown strong from the many encounters and farewells made on her journey. She prays with all of her might, giving in to neither powerful enemies nor encumbering despair. Her wishes are sure to be answered with nothing less than a miracle.
details.info: Her heart and will have grown strong from the many encounters and farewells made on her journey. She prays with all of her might, giving in to neither powerful enemies nor encumbering despair. Her wishes are sure to be answered with nothing less than a miracle.

details.desc: Practicing his swordsmanship under a waterfall allows Kaito to tune in to his surroundings, enhancing his senses. Guiding the water with his blade, he works on both the beauty and lethality of his technique. After a long day of training, he enjoys a quick snack prepared by a secret admirer.
details.info: Practicing his swordsmanship under a waterfall allows Kaito to tune in to his surroundings, enhancing his senses. Guiding the water with his blade, he works on both the beauty and lethality of his technique. After a long day of training, he enjoys a quick snack prepared by a secret admirer.

details.desc: Having reached their destination, the reborn Ancestral Dragon flew into a spring hidden deep in the forest. Wylk and the dragon were enveloped in a bright light as a green crystal appeared beside them. The Ancestral Dragon then bestowed the power of the Emerald Crystal to Wylk before slowly fading away.
details.info: Having reached their destination, the reborn Ancestral Dragon flew into a spring hidden deep in the forest. Wylk and the dragon were enveloped in a bright light as a green crystal appeared beside them. The Ancestral Dragon then bestowed the power of the Emerald Crystal to Wylk before slowly fading away.

details.desc: The young King of the Lions always has someone in mind when he wields his sword across the battlefield. Surely there are many who have been influenced by Mont in his long fight for a world without war.
details.info: The young King of the Lions always has someone in mind when he wields his sword across the battlefield. Surely there are many who have been influenced by Mont in his long fight for a world without war.

details.desc: Sylvie and her bunny went to visit the grave of her dear sister, Marian. As they were about to leave, her bunny noticed a familiar presence and turned back to see Marian's spirit gazing at Sylvie with eyes full of tender, loving care.
details.info: Sylvie and her bunny went to visit the grave of her dear sister, Marian. As they were about to leave, her bunny noticed a familiar presence and turned back to see Marian's spirit gazing at Sylvie with eyes full of tender, loving care.

details.desc: Contrary to the implications of her title as the "Demon of Hess," she holds an earnest desire in her heart. When the world is stricken with despair, she once again appears from the Earth Crystal. Miracles are brought forth by her wish to save those whom she loves and the world that they live in.
details.info: Contrary to the implications of her title as the "Demon of Hess," she holds an earnest desire in her heart. When the world is stricken with despair, she once again appears from the Earth Crystal. Miracles are brought forth by her wish to save those whom she loves and the world that they live in.

details.desc: No matter how rigorous the journey, and no matter how difficult the challenges are that await, nothing can replace the excitement felt at the start of a new journey. Take Rain and Fina's hands and embark on a brand new adventure!
details.info: No matter how rigorous the journey, and no matter how difficult the challenges are that await, nothing can replace the excitement felt at the start of a new journey. Take Rain and Fina's hands and embark on a brand new adventure!

details.desc: After Chizuru retired from her duties as a samurai, she was married and gave birth to two children. She taught them the ways of the samurai, and the four of them lived together as a family. However, their happiness ended when her daughter left to join forces of darkness...
details.info: After Chizuru retired from her duties as a samurai, she was married and gave birth to two children. She taught them the ways of the samurai, and the four of them lived together as a family. However, their happiness ended when her daughter left to join forces of darkness...

details.desc: Rain never for a single moment forgot the tragedy that took place in the town of Sacher. He shoved all the rage, all the sorrow, all the bitter frustration born on that day behind a jet-black mask and quietly stoked his resolve. He would see the empire defeated by his own hand, no matter what it cost. Until then, he refused to set aside his blade, even if that meant turning it against those he'd once called his friends.
details.info: Rain never for a single moment forgot the tragedy that took place in the town of Sacher. He shoved all the rage, all the sorrow, all the bitter frustration born on that day behind a jet-black mask and quietly stoked his resolve. He would see the empire defeated by his own hand, no matter what it cost. Until then, he refused to set aside his blade, even if that meant turning it against those he'd once called his friends.

details.desc: The long-awaited appearance of a metal cactuar. He flew onstage feeling a strong obligation to provide experience to vision cards but fled backstage and ran home after noticing the spotlight.
details.info: The long-awaited appearance of a metal cactuar. He flew onstage feeling a strong obligation to provide experience to vision cards but fled backstage and ran home after noticing the spotlight.
